name: Learning From You
description:
Help a cute robot that learns from you to beat the level.

Tutorial:

Reach the green floor together to finish a level.

Robot will repeat your movements.

Controls: WASD or Arrow Keys.

Made by Taiga and Rungrukuk.

Music taken from patrickdearteaga.com

Assets taken from:

mounirtohami.itch.io

0x72.itch.io

www.gameart2d.com
